name: Puppet Queen
effectText: When your opponent adds a monster(s) from the Main Deck to their hand, except by drawing it (and except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 EARTH Warrior monster from your hand or GY, and if you Special Summoned "Puppet King" by this effect, all EARTH Warrior monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK until the end of the next turn. You can only use this effect of "Puppet Queen" once per turn.
